raw_comment: I notice that in most sports there are way more players of colors than head coaches of color. I wonder why there are fewer head coaches of color.. does it have to do with their major.. or their backgrounds. This impacts my community because sports are working to try and include more people of color which is more important. The diversity of players and coaches within sports/team leaderships.
ace_sentences: In most sports, there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
I wonder why there are fewer head coaches of color.
I ask whether this relates to their major.
I ask whether this relates to their background.
Sports try to include more people of color.
The inclusion of more people of color is important.
The diversity of players and coaches in sports team leadership is important.
